name: Don’t Die!
description:
SUBMITTED TO THE EXTRACREDITS GAME JAM 2020!

Welcome To “Don’t Die”!

This is a 2D, Pixel Platformer, designed to be fast paced and delightfully challenging due to your ever-decreasing health.

Collect points and score before you die.

Note: 

I’m a new game dev, ok. This is my first game jam and this is my first game. Any feedback, positive or negative, would be awesome. I hope you find my game enjoyable and unique(probably not)!

:/
